question: Match Column-I with Column-II and choose the correct option given below:

**Column-I (Bacteria)**
a. Coccus
b. Bacillus
c. Vibrium
d. Spirillum

**Column-II (Shape)**
i. Rod-shaped
ii. Spiral
iii. Spherical
iv. Comma-shaped
explanation: Coccus = Spherical (iii). Bacillus = Rod-shaped (i). Vibrium = Comma-shaped (iv). Spirillum = Spiral (ii). Match: a-iii, b-i, c-iv, d-ii.
